text: David Duchovny (born August 7, 1960) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Fox Mulder on the television series, The X-Files. On August 13, 2007, his series Californication began airing on the Showtime television network. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: David Duchovny
